text: Hey. What recommendations do you guys have if you want to use HubSpot API for Wordpress - to collect leads via their HubSpot form. I see the response time from their API is very slow and it is dragging down my Site Speed. Any idea how to solve this? And still want to use HubSpot?
I'd say it depends really - test both and see the results.
Yeah I am using that Plugin - but that is the plugin that is dragging down the speed
The API for the contact form I use on my landing pages - has very slow response from the API to collect the form basically
